Translations.Text: Ibe$wviyen, s tidep, deg uaaqeb n Loahennama, ad wekkoen
Ur ipfukku fellasen. Nitni, degs, ad kkufferen
Ur ten Nednis, maca llan, nitni, d imednas
Ad necden: "a Malik, xas ad a$ Iqfeo Mass ik"! A d ini: "war ccekk, a pwellfem
Ni$ Nusa n $uowen, s tidep, maca tegwti, degwen, keohen tidep
Ne$ undin ticeokep. Ula d Nekwni Neppandi
Ne$ $ilen ur Nsell ara i lesrar nnsen, akked tumlin nnsen. Ihi, imceggaen nne£, $uosen, pparun
Ini: "lemmer illi mmi s i Uenin, nek d aabad amenzu
Gedha s Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, Mass n usgeld, mgal ayen pxeooiven
Anef asen ad nexxoen, ad uraren, alamma mmugren ass nnsen, i sen ippuwaaaden
D Neppa ay d Oebbi deg igenni, d Oebbi di tmurt, u d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ioqa Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ieoa melmi ay d imir. £uuoeS, ara tu$alem
Wid i la naaoen, war Neppa, ur $uosen kra n ccafuaa, kkes ed inagan n tidep, u nitni eoan
Ma testequav ten anwa iten Ixelqen, a d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi zzin akin
Timenna s: "a Mass iw! Wigi, s tidep, d agdud ur numin
Wexxeo asen, ini: "tifrat"! Deqqal ad eoen
